title: Starlight
description: Skye was living her life in luxury on the red carpet, with her ex-model mum, her rockstar father Nick Carter, her beautiful little sister Honey and her tiger-obsessed brother Jake. Skye longed for a normal life instead of being shoved in the spotlight all the time, where she had no friends and looked nothing like a celebrity, worst luck.Summer was living in a run-down council estate with her mother, and her father was also a rock star, who didn't remember them. - 'Girls just come and go in his world.' Summer longed for a life like Skye, but knew that this would be impossible for her.When Summer and Skye met, they felt an instant connection between themselves, as if they had always knew each other. Their relationship was something they had been missing all their lives ...
author: Anfal Khaliq
